content.text: Ku soo dhawoow casharka ugu horreeya! Maanta waxaan baran doonnaa sida Webku u shaqeeyo.
content.title: üåç Bilowga Webka

content.text:
Webku wuxuu u shaqeeyaa sida nidaamka boostada:

- **Browser** = Boostaha (wuxuu keenaa macluumaadka)
- **Server** = Xafiiska Boostada (wuxuu kaydinayaa macluumaadka)
- **HTML/CSS** = Warqadda (waxa la dirayo)
content.title: Tusaale: Nidaamka Boostada

content.caption: Sawir muujinaya: Browser, Server, iyo sidey isku xiriiraan

content.text: Webku wuxuu soo maray marxalado kala duwan:

- **Absolute path**: `/Users/name/project/images/logo.png` (full address)
